Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the frog skin active peptide family (Brevinin subfamily)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli (MIC=1 µM);Gram-positive bacterium:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=12 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Shows antibacterial against the Gram-positive bacterium S. aureus and the Gram-negative bacterium E. coli.

Literature.Title: Multiple antimicrobial peptides and peptides related to bradykinin and neuromedin N isolated from skin secretions of the pickerel frog, Rana palustris.
Literature.Author: Basir YJ, Knoop FC, Dulka J, Conlon JM.
